name: What Trash？
description:
This is a garbage classification theme game.

In several scenes with different themes, there are some “garbage” scattered, you need to find them.

In each scene, there will be 4 different garbage cans, which correspond to: recyclable, non-returnable, food waste, and other 4 types.

Throw them into the right trash can to score! There will be bonuses for combos!

Finally, we must complete these within a limited time.
